subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa clinched her second straight L.P.G.A. Tour player of the year award with a runaway victory in the Samsung World Championship in Palm Desert, Calif. Successfully defending her title in the elite event, Ochoa shot a closing six-under-par 66. The title was her seventh of the year and 16th over all. She finished at 18-under 270. Michelle Wie finished with by far her best round of the tournament, a 71 for an 18-over total to jump her into 19th place in the 20-player event.
